exercise.rubric: Complete the email with the correct words.

questions.sentence: We need to choose a new taxi company to use at our conferences.
CA Taxis cost $200 a day and 001 Taxis cost $300 a day, so CA is [cheaper].
The other advantage of CA is that their cars are [bigger].
Every car has room for eight people.
But the staff are [friendlier] at 001: their drivers are really nice people.
001 also do a lot of conferences so they are more [experienced] in our business.
And 001 is more [up-to-date]. They use all the modern technology.
Please let me know which company you prefer.
